name: Confluence editor - show tags
description: Shows markup while editing in Atlassian Confluence.
additional_info: Change log yyyy-mm-dd, most recent change first: 2018-05-23 Deleted original "Confluence rich text editor - show tags" style. Created replacement "Confluence editor - show tags" style. Replaced CSS selector body.wiki-content with #tinymce to reflect changes to Confluence editor (tested in Confluence 6.7.0) 2012-08-09 Adjusted regexp in @-moz-document wrapper to include create action, not just edit. 2012-08-08 Added a @-moz-document wrapper to restrict this user style to Confluence rich text editor pages. Tips If it doesn't work, refresh the browser page (press F5). Works for me. Might have something to do with iframes, I'm not sure.
